subject: Baseball
World Series
Television
lead_paragraph: The philosophy that what goes on between pitches in late innings is not riveting came back to haunt Fox in Game 4 of the World Series when it missed Koji Uehara’s pickoff throw.
snippet: The philosophy that what goes on between pitches in late innings is not riveting came back to haunt Fox in Game 4 of the World Series when it missed Koji Uehara’s pickoff throw.
